  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/78</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/78</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Àrab o musulmà ?</string>
            <string language="en">Arab or Muslim?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Araber oder Moslems?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arabe ou musulmans ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Árabe ou muçulmanos?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arabo o musulmani?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αραβας ή μουσουλμάνος;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre la diferència (ètnica, lingüística i fins i tot religiosa) que hi ha entre una persona àrab i una musulmana. Conté enllaç extern.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the difference (ethnic, linguistic, and even religious) between an Arab and a Muslim. It includes an external link.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">països àrabs</string>
            <string language="en">Arab countries</string>
            <string language="es">países árabes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">identitat cultural</string>
            <string language="en">cultural identity</string>
            <string language="es">identidad cultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunitat ètnica</string>
            <string language="en">ethnic community</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">islamisme</string>
            <string language="en">Islam</string>
            <string language="es">islamismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Societat</string>
            <string language="en">Society</string>
            <string language="es">Sociedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf dem 
Unterschied (ethnisch, linguistisch und sogar fromm) zwischen einem 
Araber und einem Moslem. Er schließt ein externes Link ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la différence 
(ethnique, linguistique, et même religieux) entre un Arabe et un 
musulman. Elle inclut un lien externe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) na diferença (étnico, 
lingüístico, e mesmo religioso) entre um árabe e um muçulmano. 
Inclui uma ligação externa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla differenza (etnico, 
linguistico e perfino religioso) fra un arabo e un musulmano. 
Include un collegamento esterno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στη διαφορά (εθνικός, 
γλωσσικός, και ακόμα και θρησκευτικός) μεταξύ ενός Αραβα και 
ενός μουσουλμάνου. Περιλαμβάνει μια εξωτερική σύνδεση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arabische Länder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kulturelle Identität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ethnische Gemeinschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Islam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pays arabes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">identité culturelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la communauté ethnique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Islam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Société</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Países árabes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">identidade cultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Società</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
